nodes.text: Kivaroa were large, five meter-tall, slick-skinned creatures with eight legs. They were able to be ridden by native Tsevukans on the planet Tsevuka. Around 11 years before the Battle of Yavin, a group of Tsevukans ambushed Grand Moff Tarkin's transport while on a tour. The Grand Moff was able to drive the transport before the kivaroa were driven off.
Kivaroa were created for the 2015 canon short story "Bottleneck" by John Jackson Miller, included in The Rise of the Empire bind-up.
